name: Asteroids: Space Storm
description:
Classic Asteroids clone with modern implementation. Destroy endless incoming asteroids, gather power-ups to help you survive and compete for highest score in a global list. 

If you enjoy the game, consider donating me 2€ for a coffee! Thanks for playing!

Art Credits:
Kenney,  https://www.kenney.nl, Space Shooter Redux and Pixel Square Font
JROB774, Joshua Robertson, JROB774 | OpenGameArt.org, Pixel Explosion
